dict.string: Consent to join the TrialX Study.
Now you will create a passcode to identify yourself to the app and protect access to information you've entered.
Please try again in five minutes.
On the next screen, you will be prompted to grant access to read and write some of your general and health information, such as height, weight, and steps taken so you don't have to enter it again.
We need to confirm your email address and send you a copy of the consent you just signed.
Are you sure you want to withdraw?
Withdrawing from the study will reset the app to the state it was in prior to you originally joining the study.
Thank you for your contribution to this study. We are sorry that you could not continue. The app will now close.

Current clinical trials have ~50-70% failure rate (costing $5.7B for Alzheimer disease) because the participant does not meet the inclusion/exclusion criteria, not to mention the time consumption and requirements of costly in-person meetings
General populations who are at risk of developing dementia, such as age 60 or above. Patients of neuro-degenerative disease, such as Parkinson‚Äôs and Alzhiemer‚Äôs.

Remotely identify and monitor patients‚Äô cognitive performance. If necessary, refer patients for further clinical evaluation and to provide data for clinical or observational trials for early intervention and therapy.

Use this text to provide an explanation to your app participants about what electronic health records (EHR) you intend to collect from the Health app and why. This sample will read all available records (for which permission is granted).

Welcome to TrialX study. Enrollment for cognitive impairment clinical trials, such as Parkinson‚Äôs and Alzhiemer‚Äôs, is time consuming and requires in person meetings which is costly and especially difficult during COVID-19. TrialX's goal is to provide a digital, simpler way to screen candidates for clinical trials for neuro-degenerative diseases. You would be able to access this consent form in settings at any time.

Welcome to TrialX study. Enrollment for cognitive impairment clinical trials, such as Parkinson‚Äôs and Alzhiemer‚Äôs, is time consuming and requires in person meetings which is costly and especially difficult during COVID-19. TrialX's goal is to provide a digital, simpler way to screen candidates for clinical trials for neuro-degenerative diseases. You would be able to access this consent form in settings at any time.
This study collects your touch activity, completion time, raw audio recording, eye side and area of distortions.
This study collects your touch activity, completion time, raw audio recording, eye side and area of distortions.

Your data privacy matters the most to us. We use information to help improve the safety and reliability of our services. This includes detecting, preventing, and responding to fraud, abuse, security risks and technical issues that could harm TrialX, our users or the public.

Your data privacy matters the most to us. We use information to help improve the safety and reliability of our services. This includes detecting, preventing, and responding to fraud, abuse, security risks and technical issues that could harm TrialX, our users or the public.
Focusing on preventive care, TrialX looks beyond your symptoms to consider how environmental and lifestyle factors impact your health.
Focusing on preventive care, TrialX looks beyond your symptoms to consider how environmental and lifestyle factors impact your health.

TODO: Information about the expected time commitment per app participant. Additional content.
Study surveys provide more information to your health condition and help TrialX identify and track cognitive performance.
Study surveys provide more information to your health condition and help TrialX identify and track cognitive performance.
You will be asked to complete tasks contained in this study from Trailmaking, Part A / B, Spatial Memory, Speech Recognition and Amsler Grid.
You will be asked to complete tasks contained in this study from Trailmaking, Part A / B, Spatial Memory, Speech Recognition and Amsler Grid.
At any time of using TrialX, you can opt to withdraw from the study. You will have the option to entirely erase your test data.
At any time of using TrialX, you can opt to withdraw from the study. You will have the option to entirely erase your test data.
